bibl.title: Ancient Lamps from the Mediterranean. (The Anawati Collection. Catalog I.)
bibl.note: The collection consists of 359 lamps from Egypt, Levant, North Africa and Italy.
DJURIC Srdjan, Ancient Lamps from the Mediterranean. (The Anawati Collection. Catalog I.)
Toronto, Eîka, 1995, 4°, 111 pp., 359 figg., 2 pll. coul., 1 pl. n./bl. ISBN 1-896463-02-9.
